column2: FEATURED;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ His Excellency Kouch Chamroeun
column4: has ordered the authorities involved in the provincial administration or Sihanoukville government to suspend some non-essential activities of inspecting foreign businesses
column5: especially Chinese businesses. The governor said that some foreigners were scared may stop doing business and return to their country of origin.------According to HE Governor
column6: it has been reported that city or provincial officials have been inspecting foreign places of business for various reasons
column7: such as looking at business laws or detecting business places and demanding payment
column8: etc.------His Excellency the Governor has ordered the suspension and
column10: any such checks must be approved by the Commission prior to carrying them out.------Nevertheless
column11: HE Governor had encouraged the operation to crack down on drug cases or other criminal offenses carried out by foreigners
column12: so the police force would continue regular activities.------Remarks by His Excellency Kouch Chamroeun
column13: President of the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Unity Commission were made on the afternoon of December 20
column15: with a further discussion on encouraging foreign investors to invest in legitimate businesses in Preah Sihanouk province.------TVFB
